item.title: What You Need To Know About EF Core Bulk Updates
item.description: EF Core 7 introduced two powerful new methods, ExecuteUpdate and ExecuteDelete. However, there's an important caveat: these bulk operations bypass the EF Core Change Tracker. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/what-you-need-to-know-about-ef-core-bulk-updates
